<<<<<<< HEAD
The famous water of talk and pearl, being the clearest of all waters, and is of that excellent quality for beautifying the face, that in a short time it will turn the brownest complexion to a lovely white ...
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
s.n., [London : 1670?]
Title taken from caption and first lines of text. Imprint from Wing. With a woodcut border; letter-press text framed in compartment. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
